atk-s0513a3:4210_20: idāni tayā saddhiṃ gantuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a3:4210_21: yadā pana imasmiṃ loke yena na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4210_23: api nāma tadā gaccheyya”nti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4213_0: Jambū tālaphalaṃ dajjā, atha nūna tadā siyā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4214_1: yathā hi kumudasarā kumudehi sañchannā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0513a3:4214_2: tatheva sace sakalāpi mahāgaṅgā kumudinī sīghasotaṃ pahāya santā upasantā siyā,
atk-s0513a3:4214_5: Atha nūna tadā siyāti atha tādise kāle amhākampi samāgamo nūna siyā,
atk-s0513a3:4215_1: gacchāmā”ti vutte “gacchissāmā”ti vatvā “kasmiṃ kāle”ti vutte “asukasmiñca asukasmiñcā”ti vatvā sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4218_0: Hemantikaṃ pāvuraṇaṃ, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4221_0: Daḷho ca avikampī ca, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4227_0: Rāhuñca paripāteyyuṃ, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4230_0: Aṅgāre vāsaṃ kappeyyuṃ, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4233_0: Kusalo naccagītassa, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4236_0: Aññamaññaṃ pihayyeyyuṃ, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4239_0: Vassassa paṭighātāya, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4242_0: Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya, atha nūna tadā siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4245_0: Ceṭo ādāya gaccheyya, atha nūna tadā siyā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4246_3: Hemantikaṃ pāvuraṇanti himapātasamaye pāvuraṇāya bhavituṃ samattho.
atk-s0513a3:4246_4: Atha nūna tadā siyāti atha tasmiṃ kāle mama tayā saddhiṃ ekaṃseneva saṃsaggo siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4246_6: Aṭṭālo sukatoti abhiruhitvā yujjhantaṃ purisasataṃ dhāretuṃ yathā sakkoti,
atk-s0513a3:4246_10: Vāsaṃ kappeyyunti ekekaṃ surāghaṭaṃ pivitvā mattā vaseyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4246_13: Pihayeyyunti aññamaññassa sampattiṃ icchantā pihayeyyuṃ pattheyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4246_17: Sayantaṃ savaṭākaranti yantena ceva vaṭākarena ca saddhiṃ sabbasambhārayuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4246_18: Ceṭo ādāyāti yadā evarūpaṃ nāvaṃ khuddako gāmadārako hatthena gahetvā gaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4247_0: Iti mahāsatto iminā aṭṭhānaparikappena ekādasa gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4247_1: Taṃ sutvā nagarasobhiṇī mahāsattaṃ khamāpetvā nagaraṃ gantvā rañño taṃ kāraṇaṃ ārocetvā attano jīvitaṃ yācitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a3:4248_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu mātugāmo nāma akataññū mittadubbhī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4252_0: Khamanīyaṃ yāpanīyanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ eḷikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4252_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye mahāmoggallānatthero giriparikkhitte ekadvāre giribbajasenāsane vihāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4252_3: Tadā eḷakapālakā “eḷakā ettha carantū”ti giribbajaṃ pavesetvā kīḷantā viharanti.
atk-s0513a3:4252_4: Tesu ekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ āgantvā eḷake gahetvā gacchantesu ekā eḷikā dūre caramānā eḷake nikkhamante adisvā ohīyi.
atk-s0513a3:4252_5: Taṃ pacchā nikkhamantiṃ eko dīpiko disvā “khādissāmi na”nti giribbajadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4252_6: Sāpi ito cito ca olokentī taṃ disvā “esa maṃ māretvā khāditukāmatāya ṭhito,
atk-s0513a3:4252_9: ajja mayā purisakāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā siṅgāni ukkhipitvā tassa abhimukhaṃ vegena pakkhanditvā dīpikassa “ito gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4252_10: ito gaṇhissāmī”ti vipphandatova gahaṇaṃ anupagantvā vegena palāyitvā eḷakānaṃ antaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a3:4252_11: Atha thero taṃ tesaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā punadivase gantvā tathāgatassa ārocetvā “evaṃ bhante,
atk-s0513a3:4252_12: sā eḷikā attano upāyakusalatāya parakkamaṃ katvā dīpikato muccī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4252_14: idāni tāva so dīpiko taṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a3:4252_15: pubbe pana naṃ viravantiṃ māretvā khādī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4253_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāme mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4253_1: pabbajitvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā ciraṃ himavante vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya rājagahaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a3:4253_3: Tadā imināva niyāmena eḷakapālakesu eḷake carantesu ekadivasaṃ evameva ekaṃ eḷikaṃ pacchā nikkhamantiṃ
atk-s0513a3:4253_4: disvā eko dīpiko “khādissāmi na”nti dvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4253_5: Sāpi taṃ disvā “ajja mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a3:4253_6: ekenupāyena iminā saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā hadayamassa mudukaṃ janetvā jīvitaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a3:4253_7: cintetvā dūratova tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karontī āgacchamānā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4256_0: Sukhaṃ te ammā avaca, sukhakāmāva te maya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4257_0: Tattha sukhaṃ te ammāti mayhaṃ mātāpi “tumhākaṃ sukhaṃ puccheyyāsī”ti ajja maṃ avacāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4257_1: Mayanti mātula mayampi tumhākaṃ sukhaṃ eva icchāmāti.
atk-s0513a3:4258_0: Taṃ sutvā dīpiko “ayaṃ dhuttikā maṃ mātulavādena vañcetukāmā,
atk-s0513a3:4258_1: na me kakkhaḷabhāvaṃ jānātī”ti cintetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4262_1: tvaṃ mama naṅguṭṭhamaṇḍalaṃ akkamitvā heṭhayitvā āgacchasi,
atk-s0513a3:4262_2: sā tvaṃ “ajja mātulavādena muñcitabbāhamasmī”ti maññasi nu,
atk-s0513a3:4263_0: Taṃ sutvā itarā “mātula, mā evaṃ karī”ti vatvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4266_0: Pacchato tuyhaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ, kathaṃ khvāhaṃ avakkami”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4267_1: Kathaṃ khvāhaṃ avakkaminti tava pacchato ṭhitaṃ ahaṃ kathaṃ avakkaminti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4268_1: mama naṅguṭṭhassa aṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4271_0: Tāvatā mayhaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ, kathaṃ kho taṃ vivajjayī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4272_0: Tattha tāvatāti ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ mama naṅguṭṭhaṃ parikkhipitvā gatanti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:4273_0: Taṃ sutvā eḷikā “ayaṃ pāpo madhurakathāya na allīyati,
atk-s0513a3:4273_1: paṭisattu hutvā tassa kathessāmī”ti vatvā pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4277_0: Tattha akkhiṃsūti pubbeva me etaṃ mātā ca pitā ca bhātaro ca ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4277_1: Sāmhīti sā ahaṃ ñātakānaṃ santikā tava naṅguṭṭhassa dīghabhāvaṃ sutvā tava naṅguṭṭhaṃ pariharantī vehāyasā ākāsena āgatāti.
atk-s0513a3:4278_0: Atha naṃ so “jānāmi te ahaṃ ākāsena āgatabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4278_1: evaṃ āgacchantī pana mayhaṃ bhakkhe nāsetvā āgatāsī”ti vatvā chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4281_0: Migasaṅgho palāyittha, bhakkho me nāsito tayā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4282_0: Taṃ sutvā itarā maraṇabhayabhītā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharituṃ asakkontī “mātula,
atk-s0513a3:4282_3: Itaropi naṃ vilapantiññeva khandhe gahetvā māretvā khādi.
atk-s0513a3:4287_0: “Neva duṭṭhe nayo atthi, na dhammo na subhāsitaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4288_0: Nikkamaṃ duṭṭhe yuñjetha, so ca sabbhiṃ na rañjatī”ti. –
atk-s0513a3:4290_9: So ca sabbhiṃ na rañjatīti so pana puggalo sabbhiṃ sundaraṃ subhāsitaṃ na rañjati,
atk-s0513a3:4291_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:4301_0: Parisaṅkupatho nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4301_1: So kira eko kulaputto niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvāpi atthakāmehi ācariyupajjhāyehi ceva sabrahmacārīhi ca “evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4301_11: indriyesu guttadvārena bhojane mattaññunā jāgariyamanuyuttena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4301_18: ete samādāya vattitabba”nti ovadiyamāno dubbaco ahosi akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4301_21: ahameva attano atthaṃ vā anatthaṃ vā jānissāmī”ti attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4301_22: Athassa dubbacabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ aguṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4301_25: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4301_26: bhikkhu dubbacosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā atthakāmānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4301_28: pubbepi tvaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā verambhavātamukhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇo jāto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4302_0: Atīte gijjhakūṭe pabbate bodhisatto gijjhayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a3:4302_1: Putto panassa supatto nāma gijjharājā anekasahassagijjhaparivāro thāmasampanno ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4302_5: ettakaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā na gantabba”nti ovadi.
atk-s0513a3:4302_6: So “sādhū”ti vatvāpi ekadivasaṃ pana vuṭṭhe deve gijjhehi saddhiṃ uppatitvā sese ohāya atibhūmiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a3:4302_8: Satthā tamatthaṃ dassento abhisambuddho hutvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4308_0: “Pitā ca puttaṃ avaca, jānaṃ uccaṃ papātinaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4313_0: Tato tāta nivattassu, māssu etto paraṃ gami.
atk-s0513a3:4322_0: Tañca vātasikhā tikkhā, accahāsi baliṃ dijaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4327_0: “Tassa puttā ca dārā ca, ye caññe anujīvino;
atk-s0513a3:4332_0: Sa ve byasanaṃ pappoti, akatvā vuḍḍhasāsana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4333_1: Manussā hiraññasuvaṇṇatthāya gacchantā tasmiṃ padese khāṇuke koṭṭetvā tesu rajjuyo bandhitvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a3:4333_5: Tatrāsīti tasmiṃ gijjhapabbatamatthake saṅkupathe eko gijjho āsi,
atk-s0513a3:4333_10: Jānaṃ uccaṃ papātinanti “putto te atiuccaṃ ṭhānaṃ laṅghatī”ti sutvā “ucce papātī aya”nti jānanto.
atk-s0513a3:4333_15: Cakkaṃva parimaṇḍalanti yasmiṃ te padese ṭhitassa samuddena paricchinno jambudīpo cakkamaṇḍalaṃva paññāyati,
atk-s0513a3:4334_0: Udapattosīti pitu ovādaṃ akatvā ekadivasaṃ gijjhehi saddhiṃ uppatito te ohāya pitarā kathitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4334_1: Olokayantoti taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā heṭṭhā olokento.
atk-s0513a3:4334_3: Yathāsāsi pitussutanti yathāssa pitu santikā sutaṃ āsi,
atk-s0513a3:4334_7: Tañca vātasikhā tikkhāti taṃ anovādakaṃ balimpi samānaṃ dijaṃ tikhiṇaverambhavātasikhā accahāsi atihari,
atk-s0513a3:4334_11: Anovādakareti tasmiṃ dije paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akaronte sabbepi te mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4334_12: Akatvā vuḍḍhasāsananti vuḍḍhānaṃ hitakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā evameva byasanaṃ mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a3:4334_13: Tasmā tvaṃ bhikkhu mā gijjhasadiso bhava,
atk-s0513a3:4334_15: So satthārā evaṃ ovadito tato paṭṭhāya suvaco ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4335_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:4339_0: Puthusaddoti idaṃ satthā kosambiṃ nissāya ghositārāme viharanto kosambiyaṃ bhaṇḍanakārake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4339_3: Tadā kira dve bhikkhū ekasmiṃ āvāse vasiṃsu vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca.
atk-s0513a3:4339_4: Tesu suttantiko ekadivasaṃ sarīravalañjaṃ katvā udakakoṭṭhake ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a3:4339_5: Pacchā vinayadharo tattha paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā itaraṃ pucchi “āvuso,
atk-s0513a3:4339_16: Vinayadharopi attano nissitakānaṃ “ayaṃ suttantiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:4339_17: Te tassa nissitake disvā “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4339_22: Te gantvā “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo musāvādī”ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4339_23: Tato vinayadharo okāsaṃ labhitvā tassa āpattiyā adassanena ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4339_24: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ paccayadāyakā upāsakāpi dve koṭṭhāsā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4339_25: Ovādapaṭiggāhikā bhikkhuniyopi ārakkhadevatāpi dve koṭṭhāsā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4339_26: Tāsaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattā ākāsaṭṭhadevatāpi yāva brahmalokā sabbe puthujjanā dve pakkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4339_27: Yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā pana idaṃ kolāhalaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4340_0: Atheko bhikkhu tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā ukkhepakānaṃ “dhammikeneva kammena ayaṃ ukkhitto,
atk-s0513a3:4340_2: ukkhepakehi vāriyamānānampi tesaṃ taṃ anuparivāretvā caraṇabhāvañca satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:4340_3: Bhagavā “samaggā kira hontū”ti dve vāre pesetvā “na icchanti bhante samaggā bhavitu”nti sutvā tatiyavāre
atk-s0513a3:4340_4: “bhinno bhikkhusaṅgho”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ukkhepakānaṃ ukkhepane,
atk-s0513a3:4340_5: itaresañca asañcicca āpattiyā adassane ādīnavaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a3:4340_6: Puna tesaṃ tattheva ekasīmāyaṃ uposathādīni kāretvā bhattaggādīsu bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ “āsanantarikāya nisīditabba”nti
atk-s0513a3:4340_7: bhattagge vattaṃ paññāpetvā “idānipi bhaṇḍanajātā viharantī”ti sutvā tattha gantvā “alaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4340_9: mā bhaṇḍana”ntiādīni vatvā aññatarena bhikkhunā dhammavādinā bhagavato vihesaṃ anicchantena “āgametu, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:4340_13: mayaṃ tena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti vutte –
atk-s0513a3:4341_2: bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma kāsirājā ahosīti brahmadattena dīghītissa kosalarañño rajjaṃ acchanditvā
atk-s0513a3:4341_3: aññātakavesena vasantassa māritabhāvañceva dīghāvukumārena attano jīvite dinne tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ samaggabhāvañca
atk-s0513a3:4341_6: rājūnaṃ ādinnadaṇḍānaṃ ādinnasatthānaṃ evarūpaṃ khantisoraccaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:4341_9: yaṃ tumhe evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitā samānā khamā ca bhaveyyātha soratā cā”ti ovaditvā dutiyampi tatiyampi “alaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4341_11: mā bhaṇḍana”nti vāretvā anoramante disvā “pariyādiṇṇarūpā kho ime moghapurisā,
atk-s0513a3:4341_12: na yime sukarā saññāpetu”nti pakkamitvā punadivase piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto gandhakuṭiyā thokaṃ vissamitvā
atk-s0513a3:4341_13: senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya saṅghamajjhe ākāse ṭhatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4347_0: Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ, yena nītā na taṃ vidū.
atk-s0513a3:4349_0: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0513a3:4350_0: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
atk-s0513a3:4352_0: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0513a3:4353_0: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
atk-s0513a3:4356_0: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
atk-s0513a3:4359_0: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
atk-s0513a3:4366_0: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
atk-s0513a3:4368_0: “No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4369_0: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
atk-s0513a3:4372_0: Eko care na pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4373_2: sabbovāyaṃ bhaṇḍanakārakajano samantato saddanicchāraṇena puthusaddo ceva sadiso cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a3:4373_3: Na bālo koci maññathāti tattha koci ekopi “ahaṃ bālo”ti na maññittha,
atk-s0513a3:4373_6: Nāññaṃ bhiyyo amaññarunti koci ekopi “ahaṃ bālo”ti na maññittha,
atk-s0513a3:4373_7: bhiyyo ca saṅghasmiṃ bhijjamāne aññampi ekaṃ “mayhaṃ kāraṇā saṅgho bhijjatī”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ na maññitthāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4374_10: ekopi saṅghagāravena mukhasaṅkocanaṃ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4374_11: Yena nītāti yena bhaṇḍanena imaṃ nillajjabhāvaṃ nītā.
atk-s0513a3:4374_12: Na taṃ vidūti evaṃ “ādīnavaṃ ida”nti taṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0513a3:4375_0: Ye ca taṃ upanayhantīti taṃ “akkocchi ma”ntiādikaṃ ākāraṃ ye upanayhanti.
atk-s0513a3:4375_2: Pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe bhaṇḍanakārakā pare nāma.
atk-s0513a3:4375_3: Te ettha saṅghamajjhe kolāhalaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase upayamāma nassāma,
atk-s0513a3:4375_4: satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0513a3:4375_5: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccusamīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti.
atk-s0513a3:4375_7: evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0513a3:4376_0: Aṭṭhicchinnāti ayaṃ gāthā brahmadattañca dīghāvukumārañca sandhāya vuttā.
atk-s0513a3:4376_3: Yesaṃ vo neva mātāpitūnaṃ aṭṭhīni chinnāni,
atk-s0513a3:4376_8: tesañhi nāma ādinnadaṇḍānaṃ ādinnasatthānaṃ rājūnaṃ evarūpā saṅgati samāgamo āvāhavivāhasambandhaṃ katvā ekato pānabhojanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4376_9: tumhe evarūpe sāsane pabbajitvā attano veramattampi jahituṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0513a3:4377_0: Sace labhethātiādigāthāyo paṇḍitasahāyassa ca bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0513a3:4377_1: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayānīti sabbe pākaṭaparissaye ca paṭicchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvā tena saddhiṃ attamano satimā careyya.
atk-s0513a3:4377_2: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāyāti yathā attano vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ mahājanakarājā ca arindamarājā ca pahāya ekakova cariṃsu,
atk-s0513a3:4377_7: Yathā hi mātuposako mātaṅganāgo araññe ekako cari,
atk-s0513a3:4377_12: na ca pāpāni kayirāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a3:4378_0: Satthā evaṃ kathetvāpi te bhikkhū samagge kātuṃ asakkonto bālakaloṇakagāmaṃ gantvā bhaguttherassa ekībhāve
atk-s0513a3:4378_1: ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā tato tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tesaṃ sāmaggivāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a3:4378_2: tato pālileyyakavanasaṇḍaṃ gantvā tattha temāsaṃ vasitvā puna kosambiṃ agantvā sāvatthimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4378_4: kosambakā bhikkhū bahuno amhākaṃ anatthassa kārakā,
atk-s0513a3:4378_8: evaṃ ime pakkamissanti vā veraṃ viramissanti vā bhagavantaṃ vā pasādessantī”ti sammantayitvā tatheva akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4378_9: Te tena daṇḍakammena pīḷitā sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4379_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:4383_0: Dumo yadā hotīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4383_1: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kosalajanapade aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ upanissāya araññe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4383_2: Manussā tassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni sampādetvā gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne senāsanaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4383_3: Tassa vassūpagatassa paṭhamamāseyeva so gāmo jhāyi,
atk-s0513a3:4383_5: Te tassa paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4383_6: So sappāyasenāsanepi piṇḍapātena kilamanto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:4383_7: Atha naṃ temāsaccayena satthāraṃ vandituṃ āgataṃ satthā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kacci bhikkhu piṇḍapātena na kilamantosi,
atk-s0513a3:4383_10: Satthā “tassa senāsanaṃ sappāya”nti ñatvā “bhikkhu samaṇena nāma senāsanasappāye sati loluppacāraṃ pahāya
atk-s0513a3:4383_11: kiñcideva yathāladdhaṃ paribhuñjitvā santuṭṭhena samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a3:4383_12: Porāṇakapaṇḍitā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā attano nivāsasukkharukkhe cuṇṇaṃ khādantāpi loluppacāraṃ
atk-s0513a3:4383_13: pahāya santuṭṭhā mittadhammaṃ abhinditvā aññattha na gamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a3:4383_14: tvaṃ pana kasmā ‘piṇḍapāto paritto lūkho’ti sappāyasenāsanaṃ pariccajī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4384_0: Atīte himavante gaṅgātīre ekasmiṃ udumbaravane anekasatasahassā sukā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4384_1: Tatra eko suvarājā attano nivāsarukkhassa phalesu khīṇesu yadeva avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti aṅkuro vā pattaṃ vā taco vā papaṭikā vā,
atk-s0513a3:4384_2: taṃ khāditvā gaṅgāya pānīyaṃ pivitvā paramappicchasantuṭṭho hutvā aññattha na gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:4384_4: Sakko āvajjamāno taṃ disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthaṃ attano ānubhāvena taṃ rukkhaṃ sukkhāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4384_5: Rukkho khāṇukamatto hutvā chiddāvachiddo vāte paharante ākoṭiyamāno viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4384_7: Suvarājā tāni cuṇṇāni khāditvā gaṅgāya pānīyaṃ pivitvā aññattha agantvā vātātapaṃ agaṇetvā udumbarakhāṇuke nisīdi.
atk-s0513a3:4384_8: Sakko tassa paramappicchabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mittadhammaguṇaṃ kathāpetvā varamassa datvā udumbaraṃ amataphalaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4384_9: karitvā āgamissāmī”ti eko haṃsarājā hutvā sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ purato katvā taṃ udumbaravanaṃ gantvā avidūre
atk-s0513a3:4384_10: ekarukkhassa sākhāya nisīditvā tena saddhiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4386_0: “Dumo yadā hoti phalūpapanno, bhuñjanti naṃ vihaṅgamā sampatantā;
atk-s0513a3:4387_0: Khīṇanti ñatvāna dumaṃ phalaccaye, disodisaṃ yanti tato vihaṅgamā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4388_2: tadā taṃ sākhato sākhaṃ sampatantāva vihaṅgamā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a3:4388_3: taṃ pana khīṇaṃ ñatvā phalānaṃ accayena tato rukkhato disodisaṃ vihaṅgamā gacchantīti.
atk-s0513a3:4389_0: Evañca pana vatvā tato naṃ uyyojetuṃ dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4391_0: “Cara cārikaṃ lohitatuṇḍa mā mari, kiṃ tvaṃ suva sukkhadumamhi jhāyasi;
atk-s0513a3:4392_0: Tadiṅgha maṃ brūhi vasantasannibha, kasmā suva sukkhadumaṃ na riñcasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4393_0: Tattha jhāyasīti kiṃkāraṇā sukkhakhāṇumatthake jhāyanto pajjhāyanto tiṭṭhasi.
atk-s0513a3:4393_2: Vasantasannibhāti vasantakāle vanasaṇḍo suvagaṇasamokiṇṇo viya nīlobhāso hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4394_0: Atha naṃ suvarājā “ahaṃ haṃsa attano kataññukataveditāya imaṃ rukkhaṃ na jahāmī”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4396_0: “Ye ve sakhīnaṃ sakhāro bhavanti, pāṇaccaye dukkhasukhesu haṃsa;
atk-s0513a3:4397_0: Khīṇaṃ akhīṇampi na taṃ jahanti, santo sataṃ dhammamanussarantā.
atk-s0513a3:4399_0: “Sohaṃ sataṃ aññatarosmi haṃsa, ñātī ca me hoti sakhā ca rukkho;
atk-s0513a3:4400_0: Taṃ nussahe jīvikattho pahātuṃ, khīṇanti ñatvāna na hesa dhammo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4401_0: Tattha ye ve sakhīnaṃ sakhāro bhavantīti ye sahāyānaṃ sahāyā honti.
atk-s0513a3:4401_1: Khīṇaṃ akhīṇampīti paṇḍitā nāma attano sahāyaṃ bhogaparikkhayena khīṇampi akhīṇampi na jahanti.
atk-s0513a3:4401_4: ayaṃ rukkho sampiyāyanatthena mayhaṃ ñāti ca samāciṇṇacaraṇatāya sakhā ca.
atk-s0513a3:4401_5: Jīvikatthoti tamahaṃ jīvikāya atthiko hutvā pahātuṃ na sakkomi.
atk-s0513a3:4402_0: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭho pasaṃsitvā varaṃ dātukāmo dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4404_0: “Sādhu sakkhi kataṃ hoti, metti saṃsati santhavo;
atk-s0513a3:4407_0: “So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
atk-s0513a3:4408_0: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4409_2: metti saṃsati santhavoti sakhibhāvo ca metti ca parisamajjhe santhavo cāti tayā mittaṃ kataṃ sādhu hoti laddhakaṃ bhaddakameva.
atk-s0513a3:4409_4: Vijānatanti evaṃ sante viññūnaṃ pasaṃsitabbayuttakosīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4409_7: Yaṃ kiñci manasicchasīti yaṃ kiñci manasā icchasi,
atk-s0513a3:4410_0: Taṃ sutvā suvarājā varaṃ gaṇhanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4412_0: “Varañca me haṃsa bhavaṃ dadeyya, ayañca rukkho punarāyuṃ labhetha;
atk-s0513a3:4413_0: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4414_3: Madhutthikoti saṃvijjamānamadhuraphalesu pakkhittamadhu viya madhuraphalo hutvāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4415_0: Athassa sakko varaṃ dadamāno aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4417_0: “Taṃ passa samma phalimaṃ uḷāraṃ, sahāva te hotu udumbarena;
atk-s0513a3:4418_0: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4419_0: Tattha sahāva te hotu udumbarenāti tava udumbarena saddhiṃ saha ekatova vāso hotu.
atk-s0513a3:4420_0: Evañca pana vatvā sakko taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā attano ca sujāya ca ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā gaṅgāto hatthena udakaṃ gahetvā udumbarakhāṇukaṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a3:4420_1: Tāvadeva sākhāviṭapasacchanno madhuraphalo rukkho uṭṭhahitvā muṇḍamaṇipabbato viya vilāsasampanno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4420_2: Suvarājā taṃ disvā somanassappatto sakkassa thutiṃ karonto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4422_0: “Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0513a3:4424_0: Sakkopi tassa varaṃ datvā udumbaraṃ amataphalaṃ katvā saddhiṃ sujāya attano ṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a3:4426_0: “Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4427_0: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4428_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu porāṇakapaṇḍitā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattāpi aloluppacārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4428_1: Tvaṃ pana kasmā evarūpe sāsane pabbajitvā loluppacāraṃ carasi,
atk-s0513a3:4428_2: gaccha tattheva vasāhī”ti kammaṭṭhānamassa kathetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a3:4428_3: So bhikkhu tattha gantvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a3:4432_0: Santi rukkhāti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto verañjakaṇḍaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4432_1: Satthari verañjāyaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ anuppatte bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a3:4432_2: tathāgato khattiyasukhumālo buddhasukhumālo mahantena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatopi verañjabrāhmaṇena
atk-s0513a3:4432_3: nimantito temāsaṃ vasanto mārāvaṭṭanavasena tassa santikā ekadivasampi bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā loluppacāraṃ
atk-s0513a3:4432_4: pahāya temāsaṃ patthapulakapiṭṭhodakena yāpento aññattha na agamāsi,
atk-s0513a3:4432_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4432_11: pubbepi tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi loluppacāraṃ pahāsi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4435_0: Kasmā nu sukkhe koḷāpe, suvassa nirato mano.
atk-s0513a3:4438_0: Aphalampi viditvāna, sāva metti yathā pure.
atk-s0513a3:4441_0: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ dosaṃ passase dija.
atk-s0513a3:4446_0: “Sādhu sakkhi kataṃ hoti, metti saṃsati santhavo;
atk-s0513a3:4449_0: “So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
atk-s0513a3:4450_0: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0513a3:4452_0: “Api nāma naṃ passeyyaṃ, sapattaṃ saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4458_0: “Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0513a3:4461_0: “Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4462_0: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vana”nti. –
atk-s0513a3:4463_0: Pañhapaṭipañhāpi atthopi purimanayeneva veditabbā, anuttānapadameva pana vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0513a3:4464_1: Koḷāpeti vāte paharante ākoṭitasaddaṃ viya muñcamāne nissāre.
atk-s0513a3:4464_2: Suvassāti āyasmato suvarājassa kasmā evarūpe rukkhe mano nirato.
atk-s0513a3:4464_5: Bahūti samānepi anekasate na dve tayo,
atk-s0513a3:4464_7: Viditvānāti haṃsarāja idāni amhākaṃ imaṃ rukkhaṃ aphalaṃ viditvāpi yathā pure etena saddhiṃ metti,
atk-s0513a3:4464_10: mettiṃ bhindantā hi anariyā asappurisā nāma hontīti pakāsento evamāha.
atk-s0513a3:4465_1: Kiṃ dosaṃ passaseti aññe sakuṇā etaṃ ohāya aññattha gacchanti,
atk-s0513a3:4465_2: tvaṃ evaṃ gamane kiṃ nāma dosaṃ passasi.
atk-s0513a3:4465_3: Ye phalatthāti ye pakkhino phalatthāya phalakāraṇā sambhajanti upagacchanti,
atk-s0513a3:4465_6: paraṃ anoloketvā attaniyeva vā ṭhitā etesaṃ paññāti attatthapaññā.
atk-s0513a3:4465_7: Pakkhapātinoti te attanoyeva vuḍḍhiṃ paccāsīsamānā mittapakkhaṃ pātenti nāsentīti pakkhapātino nāma honti.
atk-s0513a3:4466_3: api nāma ahaṃ imaṃ rukkhaṃ sapattaṃ saphalaṃ puna passeyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4466_4: tato daliddo nidhiṃ labhitvāva punappunaṃ etaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4466_6: Amatamādāyāti attano ānubhāvena ṭhito gaṅgodakaṃ gahetvā abhisiñcayīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4466_7: Imasmiṃ jātake imāya saddhiṃ dve abhisambuddhagāthā honti.
atk-s0513a3:4467_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:4471_0: Sutaṃ metaṃ mahābrahmeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4471_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ ekaṃ alaṅkatamātugāmaṃ disvā ukkaṇṭhitaṃ dīghakesanakhalomaṃ vibbhamitukāmaṃ ācariyupajjhāyehi aruciyā ānītaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4471_2: Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4471_4: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kileso nāma guṇaviddhaṃsako appassādo niraye nibbattāpeti,
atk-s0513a3:4471_5: esa pana kileso kiṃkāraṇā taṃ na kilamessati?
atk-s0513a3:4471_6: Na hi sineruṃ paharitvā paharaṇavāto purāṇapaṇṇassa lajjati,
atk-s0513a3:4471_7: imañhi kilesaṃ nissāya bodhiñāṇassa anupadaṃ caramānā pañcaabhiññaaṭṭhasamāpattilābhino visuddhamahāpurisāpi
atk-s0513a3:4471_8: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetuṃ asakkontā jhānaṃ antaradhāpesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4472_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ nigame asītikoṭivibhave brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:4472_2: So vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā uggahitasippo kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena dhanavilokanaṃ katvā “dhanameva paññāyati,
atk-s0513a3:4472_4: mayāpi maraṇamukhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇena bhavitabba”nti maraṇabhayabhīto mahādānaṃ datvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a3:4472_5: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sattame divase abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā tattha ciraṃ vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0513a3:4472_6: yāpetvā loṇambilasevanatthāya pabbatā otaritvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0513a3:4472_8: Rājā taṃ disvā pasannacitto pakkosāpetvā samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4472_12: bhante”ti bhuttapātarāso taṃ ādāya uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīni kārāpetvā uyyānapālaṃ paricārakaṃ katvā datvā vanditvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a3:4472_13: Mahāsatto tato paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ rañño gehe bhuñjanto dvādasa vassāni tattha vasi.
atk-s0513a3:4473_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ puññakkhettaṃ mā pamajjī”ti mahāsattaṃ deviyā niyyādetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4473_1: Tato paṭṭhāya sā mahāsattaṃ sahatthā parivisati.
atk-s0513a3:4473_2: Athekadivasaṃ sā bhojanaṃ sampādetvā tasmiṃ cirāyamāne gandhodakena nhatvā saṇhaṃ maṭṭhasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a3:4473_3: sīhapañjaraṃ vivarāpetvā sarīre vātaṃ paharāpentī khuddakamañcake nipajji.
atk-s0513a3:4473_4: Mahāsattopi divātaraṃ sunivattho supāruto bhikkhābhājanaṃ ādāya ākāsenāgantvā sīhapañjaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a3:4473_5: Deviyā tassa vākacirasaddaṃ sutvā vegena uṭṭhahantiyā maṭṭhasāṭako bhassi,
atk-s0513a3:4473_7: Athassa anekavassakoṭisatasahassakāle abbhantare nivutthakileso karaṇḍake sayitaāsīviso viya uṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ antaradhāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4473_8: So satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto gantvā deviṃ hatthe gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a3:4473_10: So tāya saddhiṃ lokadhammaṃ sevitvā bhuñjitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tato paṭṭhāya devasikaṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4473_11: Tassa tāya saddhiṃ lokadhammapaṭisevanaṃ sakalanagare pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4473_13: Rājā “maṃ bhinditukāmā evaṃ vadantī”ti asaddahitvā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a3:4473_15: kira mama ayyo haritacatāpaso tayā saddhiṃ lokadhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4473_16: So tassāpi asaddahitvā “tameva paṭipucchissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā taṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4476_0: Kaccetaṃ vacanaṃ tucchaṃ, kacci suddho iriyyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4477_0: Tattha kaccetanti kacci etaṃ “hārito kāme paribhuñjatī”ti amhehi sutaṃ vacanaṃ tucchaṃ abhūtaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4478_2: imasmiṃ loke saccasadisī patiṭṭhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a3:4478_3: Ujjhitasaccā hi bodhimūle nisīditvā bodhiṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a3:4478_5: Bodhisattassa hi ekaccesu ṭhānesu pāṇātipātopi adinnādānampi kāmesumicchācāropi surāmerayamajjapānampi hotiyeva,
atk-s0513a3:4478_6: atthabhedakavisaṃvādanaṃ purakkhatvā musāvādo nāma na hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4478_7: tasmā so saccameva kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4486_0: Yāya uppatitaṃ rāgaṃ, kiṃ mano na vinodaye”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4487_4: tumhākaṃ panesā nipuṇā sādhūnaṃ atthānaṃ cintinī paññā kimatthiyā,
atk-s0513a3:4487_5: yāya puna uppatitaṃ rāgaṃ kiṃ mano na vinodaye,
atk-s0513a3:4488_0: Athassa kilesabalaṃ dassento hārito catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4491_0: Rāgo doso mado moho, yattha paññā na gādhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4492_0: Tattha yatthāti yesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pattesu mahoghe patitā viya paññā gādhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0513a3:4496_0: Medhāvī paṇḍito ceva, iti no sammato bhava”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4497_0: Tattha iti no sammatoti evaṃ amhākaṃ sammato sambhāvito bhavaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4503_0: Atha naṃ kilesappahāne ussāhaṃ kārento rājā sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4506_0: Taṃ pajaha bhaddamatthu te, bahunnāsi medhāvisammato”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4507_0: Tattha vaṇṇavidūsano tavāti tava sarīravaṇṇassa ca guṇavaṇṇassa ca vidūsano.
atk-s0513a3:4508_0: Tato mahāsatto satiṃ labhitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ sallakkhetvā aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4511_0: Tesaṃ mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4512_1: Bahudukkheti ettha “appassādā kāmā”tiādīni suttāni haritvā tesaṃ bahudukkhatā dassetabbā.
atk-s0513a3:4512_2: Mahāviseti sampayuttakilesavisassa ceva vipākavisassa ca mahantatāya mahāvise.
atk-s0513a3:4512_3: Tesaṃ mūlanti te vuttappakāre kāme pahātuṃ tesaṃ mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ pariyesissāmi.
atk-s0513a3:4512_7: idāneva paññākhaggena paharitvā subhanimittabandhanena sabandhanaṃ rāgaṃ chindissāmīti.
atk-s0513a3:4513_1: okāsaṃ tāva me karohī”ti okāsaṃ kāretvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā puna naṭṭhajjhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4513_2: uppādetvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4513_5: puna dāni ahaṃ anitthigandhavanasaṇḍameva gamissāmī”ti rañño rodantassa paridevantassa himavantameva gantvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4518_0: Abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4519_0: Tadā rājā ānando ahosi, haritacatāpaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:4523_0: Bahussutanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dārakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_1: So kira sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikaputto sattavassakāleyeva padakusalo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_2: Athassa pitā “imaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti tassa ajānantasseva mittagharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_3: So pitu gataṭṭhānaṃ apucchitvāva tassa padānusārena gantvā pitu santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_5: tvaṃ mayi taṃ ajānāpetvā gatepi mama gataṭṭhānaṃ kiṃ jānāsī”ti? “Tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4523_8: Athassa vīmaṃsanatthāya pitā bhuttapātarāso gharā nikkhamitvā anantaraṃ paṭivissakagharaṃ gantvā tato dutiyaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4523_9: tato tatiyaṃ gharaṃ pavisitvā tatiyagharā nikkhamitvā puna attano gharaṃ āgantvā tato uttaradvārena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a3:4523_10: nagaraṃ vāmaṃ karonto jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_11: Dārako “kahaṃ me pitā”ti pucchitvā “na jānāmā”ti vutte tassa padānusārena anantarapaṭivissakassa gharaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4523_12: ādiṃ katvā pitu gatamaggeneva jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pitu santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4523_14: mama idhāgatabhāvaṃ aññāsī”ti puṭṭho “padaṃ te sañjānitvā padānusārena āgatomhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4523_17: ahaṃ imaṃ vīmaṃsanto iminā nāma upāyena āgato,
atk-s0513a3:4523_18: ayampi maṃ gehe adisvā mama padānusārena āgato”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0513a3:4523_20: porāṇakapaṇḍitā ākāse padaṃ sañjāniṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4524_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa aggamahesī aticaritvā raññā pucchitā “sace ahaṃ tumhe aticarāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4524_1: assamukhī yakkhinī homī”ti sapathaṃ katvā tato kālaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ pabbatapāde assamukhī yakkhinī hutvā
atk-s0513a3:4524_2: leṇaguhāyaṃ vasamānā mahāaṭaviyaṃ pubbantato aparantaṃ gamanamagge anusañcarante manusse gahetvā khādati.
atk-s0513a3:4524_3: Sā kira tīṇi vassāni vessavaṇaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā āyāmato tiṃsayojane vitthārato pañcayojane ṭhāne manusse khādituṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a3:4524_4: Athekadivasaṃ eko aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo abhirūpo brāhmaṇo bahūhi manussehi parivuto taṃ maggaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a3:4524_7: Sā vātavegena gantvā brāhmaṇaṃ gahetvā piṭṭhiyā nipajjāpetvā guhaṃ gacchantī purisasamphassaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0513a3:4524_8: kilesavasena tasmiṃ sinehaṃ uppādetvā taṃ akhāditvā attano sāmikaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4524_9: Te ubhopi samaggasaṃvāsaṃ vasiṃsu tato paṭṭhāya yakkhinī manusse gaṇhantī vatthataṇḍulatelādīnipi gahetvā
atk-s0513a3:4524_10: tassa nānaggarasabhojanaṃ upanetvā attanā manussamaṃsaṃ khādati.
atk-s0513a3:4524_11: Gamanakāle tassa palāyanabhayena mahatiyā silāya guhādvāraṃ pidahitvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:4524_12: Evaṃ tesu sammodamānesu vasantesu bodhisatto nibbattaṭṭhānā cavitvā brāhmaṇaṃ paṭicca tassā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a3:4524_13: Sā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā putte ca brāhmaṇe ca balavasinehā hutvā ubhopi posesi.
atk-s0513a3:4524_14: Sā aparabhāge putte vuḍḍhippatte puttampi pitarā saddhiṃ antoguhāyaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ pidahi.
atk-s0513a3:4525_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto tassā gatakālaṃ ñatvā silaṃ apanetvā pitaraṃ bahi akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4525_3: andhakāre nisīdituṃ na sakkomī”ti vutte puttasinehena na kiñci avoca.
atk-s0513a3:4525_16: tava manussapathasampāpanaṃ mama bhāro”ti pitaraṃ samassāsetvā punadivase mātari gatāya pitaraṃ gahetvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a3:4525_17: Yakkhinī āgantvā te adisvā vātavegena pakkhanditvā te gahetvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:4525_21: putto te maṃ gahetvā palāyatī”ti vutte puttasinehena kiñci avatvā te assāsetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaññeva
atk-s0513a3:4525_22: te gahetvā gantvā evaṃ punapi katipaye divase palāyante ānesi.
atk-s0513a3:4526_0: Bodhisatto cintesi “mayhaṃ mātu paricchinnena okāsena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4526_3: So ekadivasaṃ mātaraṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “amma,
atk-s0513a3:4526_5: akkhāhi tāva me attano santakāya bhūmiyā pariccheda”nti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4526_6: Sā sabbadisāsu pabbatanadīnimittādīni kathetvā āyāmato tiṃsayojanaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4526_7: vitthārato pañcayojanaṃ puttassa kathetvā “idaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhehi puttā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4526_8: So dve tayo divase atikkamitvā mātu aṭavigatakāle pitaraṃ khandhaṃ āropetvā tassā dinnasaññāya vātavegena pakkhando paricchedanadītīraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a3:4526_11: Sā āgantvā nadītīre ṭhatvā attano paricchedaṃ atikkantabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattheva ṭhatvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4526_14: tumhākaṃ maṃ nissāya kiṃ nāma na sampajjati, nivatta,
atk-s0513a3:4526_22: na sakkā sabbakālaṃ tava santike vasitu”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4526_27: ahaṃ ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4526_28: tassānubhāvena dvādasasaṃvaccharamatthake haṭabhaṇḍampi padānupadaṃ gantvā sakkā jānituṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4526_29: Ayaṃ te jīvikā bhavissati, uggaṇha, tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4526_30: anagghaṃ manta”nti tathārūpena dukkhena abhibhūtāpi puttasinehena mantaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4527_0: Bodhisatto nadiyā ṭhitakova mātaraṃ vanditvā atisakkaccaṃ sutaṃ katvā mantaṃ gahetvā mātaraṃ vanditvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a3:4527_2: tumhesu anivattantesu mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ natthī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0513a3:4528_0: “Ehi putta nivattassu, mā anāthaṃ karohi me;
atk-s0513a3:4529_0: Ajja puttaṃ apassantī, yakkhinī maraṇaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4530_3: Tadā bodhisatto tassā matabhāvaṃ ñatvā pitaraṃ pakkositvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā citakaṃ katvā jhāpetvā
atk-s0513a3:4530_4: āḷāhanaṃ nibbāpetvā nānāvaṇṇehi pupphehi pūjetvā vanditvā roditvā paridevitvā pitaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a3:4530_5: gantvā rājadvāre ṭhatvā “padakusalo māṇavo dvāre ṭhito”ti rañño paṭivedetvā “tena hi āgacchatū”ti vutte
atk-s0513a3:4530_8: dvādasasaṃvaccharamatthake haṭabhaṇḍaṃ padānupadaṃ gantvā gaṇhituṃ jānāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4531_2: mayaṃ tassa māṇavassa sippānubhāvena kassaci kammassa akatattā ‘sippaṃ atthi vā natthi vā’ti na jānāma,
atk-s0513a3:4531_4: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā ubhopi janā nānāratanagopakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā ratanasārabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a3:4531_5: pāsādā oruyha rājanivesanantare tikkhattuṃ āvijjhitvā nisseṇiṃ attharitvā pākāramatthakena bahi otaritvā
atk-s0513a3:4531_6: vinicchayasālaṃ pavisitvā tattha nisīditvā puna gantvā nisseṇiṃ attharitvā pākāramatthakena otaritvā
atk-s0513a3:4531_7: antepure pokkharaṇiyā tīraṃ gantvā pokkharaṇiṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā otaritvā antopokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4531_9: Punadivase “rājanivesanato kira ratanaṃ hariṃsū”ti ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4531_10: Rājā ajānanto viya hutvā bodhisattaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4531_14: dvādasasaṃvaccharamatthake haṭabhaṇḍaṃ corānaṃ padānupadaṃ gantvā āharaṇasamatthassa mama anacchariyaṃ ajja rattiṃ haṭabhaṇḍaṃ āharituṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4531_19: devā”ti vatvā mātaraṃ vanditvā mantaṃ parivattetvā mahātale ṭhitova “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4531_20: dvinnaṃ corānaṃ padaṃ paññāyatī”ti vatvā rañño ca purohitassa ca padānusārena sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā tato
atk-s0513a3:4531_21: nikkhamitvā pāsādā oruyha rājanivesanantare tikkhattuṃ parigantvā padānusāreneva pākārasamīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a3:4531_23: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pākārato muccitvā ākāse padaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0513a3:4531_24: nisseṇiṃ attharāpetvā dethā”ti nisseṇiṃ pākāramatthakena otaritvā padānusāreneva vinicchayasālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a3:4531_25: puna rājanivesanaṃ āgantvā nisseṇiṃ attharāpetvā pākāramatthakena oruyha pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0513a3:4531_27: corā imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ otiṇṇā”ti vatvā attanā ṭhapitaṃ viya bhaṇḍikaṃ nīharitvā rañño datvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4531_28: ime dve corā abhiññātamahācorā iminā maggena rājanivesanaṃ abhiruḷhā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4532_1: “ayaṃ māṇavo padānusārena gantvā corehi ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṭṭhānameva maññe jānāti,
atk-s0513a3:4532_3: Atha naṃ āha “corehi haṭabhaṇḍaṃ tāva no tayā āhaṭaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4532_11: tato tumhākaṃ bhaṇḍikassa laddhakālato paṭṭhāya corehi ko attho,
atk-s0513a3:4532_22: taṃ kāraṇaṃ jānāthā”ti so evaṃ vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4533_0: Atīte bārāṇasito avidūre nadītīragāmake pāṭali nāma eko naṭo vasati.
atk-s0513a3:4533_1: So ekasmiṃ ussavadivase bhariyamādāya bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā naccitvā vīṇaṃ vāditvā gāyitvā dhanaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a3:4533_2: ussavapariyosāne bahuṃ surābhattaṃ gāhāpetvā attano gāmaṃ gacchanto nadītīraṃ patvā navodakaṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4533_3: disvā bhattaṃ bhuñjanto suraṃ pivanto nisīditvā matto hutvā attano balaṃ ajānanto “mahāvīṇaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā
atk-s0513a3:4533_4: nadiṃ uttaritvā gamissāmī”ti bhariyaṃ hatthe gahetvā nadiṃ otari.
atk-s0513a3:4533_6: Atha naṃ sā vīṇā udake osīdāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4533_7: Bhariyā panassa osīdanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ vissajjetvā uttaritvā tīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4533_11: Athassa bhariyā cintesi “mayhaṃ sāmiko idāni marissati,
atk-s0513a3:4533_12: ekaṃ naṃ gītakaṃ yācitvā parisamajjhe taṃ gāyantī jīvikaṃ kappessāmī”ti cintetvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4536_0: Vuyhamānaka bhaddante, ekaṃ me dehi gāthaka”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4538_2: idāni mahājanassa paṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ udakaṃ maṃ māretī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4541_0: Tassa majjhe marissāmi, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4542_3: tesaṃ santikā bhaye uppanne taṃ bhayaṃ ko paṭibāhissatī”ti vatvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4542_5: mayā pana paṇḍitavedanīyaṃ katvā kathitaṃ, jānāhi,
atk-s0513a3:4542_10: idaṃ sutvā jānāhī”ti aparampi kāraṇaṃ āhari. Deva,
atk-s0513a3:4542_11: pubbe imissāva bārāṇasiyā dvāragāme eko kumbhakāro bhājanatthāya mattikaṃ āharanto ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne
atk-s0513a3:4542_12: nibaddhaṃ gaṇhitvā antopabbhāraṃ mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇi.
atk-s0513a3:4542_13: Athekadivasaṃ tassa mattikaṃ gaṇhantassa akālamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā mahāvuṭṭhiṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a3:4545_0: Sā me sīsaṃ nipīḷeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4547_1: mahājanassa paṭisaraṇabhūtā mahāpathavī kumbhakārassa sīsaṃ bhindi,
atk-s0513a3:4547_2: evameva mahāpathavīsame sabbalokassa paṭisaraṇe narinde uṭṭhāya corakammaṃ karonte ko bāhissati,
atk-s0513a3:4547_4: evaṃ paṭicchādetvā kathitaṃ coraṃ jānitunti. Tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4547_6: ayaṃ coroti evaṃ me coraṃ gahetvā dehīti.
atk-s0513a3:4547_7: So rājānaṃ rakkhanto “tvaṃ coro”ti avatvā aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4547_8: pubbe imasmiṃyeva nagare ekassa purisassa gehaṃ ādittaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4547_9: So “anto pavisitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ nīharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4547_11: So dhūmandho hutvā nikkhamanamaggaṃ alabhanto uppannaḍāhadukkho hutvā anto ṭhitova paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4550_0: So maṃ ḍahati gattāni, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4551_0: Tattha so maṃ ḍahatīti so me ḍahati, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a3:4552_1: aggi viya mahājanassa paṭisaraṇabhūto eko manusso ratanabhaṇḍikaṃ hari,
atk-s0513a3:4552_4: So rājānaṃ “tvaṃ coro”ti avatvā aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Deva,
atk-s0513a3:4552_5: pubbe imasmiṃyeva nagare eko puriso atibahuṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto vedanāppatto hutvā paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4555_0: So maṃ bhutto byāpādeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4556_0: Tattha so maṃ bhutto byāpādetīti so odano bhutto maṃ byāpādeti māreti.
atk-s0513a3:4557_1: bhattaṃ viya mahājanassa paṭisaraṇabhūto eko bhaṇḍaṃ hari,
atk-s0513a3:4557_4: So tassa saññāpanatthaṃ aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4557_5: pubbepi imasmiṃyeva nagare ekassa vāto uṭṭhahitvā gattāni bhañji.
atk-s0513a3:4560_0: So maṃ bhañjati gattāni, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4561_4: So tassa saññāpanatthaṃ aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Deva,
atk-s0513a3:4561_5: atīte himavantapadese sākhāviṭapasampanno mahārukkho ahosi pupphaphalasampanno anekasahassānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4561_6: nivāso tassa dve sākhā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭesuṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4564_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4566_6: Athassa so aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4566_7: ekasmiṃ kāsigāme aññatarassa kulagharassa pacchimabhāge kakkhaḷā susumāranadī atthi,
atk-s0513a3:4566_10: Tassa mātā anicchamānasseva ekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a3:4566_11: Sā pubbabhāge sassuṃ sampiyāyitvā pacchā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhamānā taṃ nīharitukāmā ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4566_12: Tassā pana mātāpi tasmiṃyeva ghare vasati.
atk-s0513a3:4566_13: Sā sāmikassa santike sassuyā nānappakāraṃ dosaṃ vatvā paribhinditvā “ahaṃ te mātaraṃ posetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a3:4566_15: kathaṃ naṃ māremī”ti vutte “niddokkamanakāle naṃ mañcakeneva saddhiṃ gahetvā susumāranadiyaṃ khipissāma,
atk-s0513a3:4566_20: tassā nipannamañcake rajjuṃ bandhitvā saññaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4566_21: Sā tathā katvā “katā me saññā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4566_23: manussā tāva niddāyantū”ti niddāyanto viya nipajjitvā gantvā taṃ rajjukaṃ bhariyāya mātu mañcake bandhitvā
atk-s0513a3:4566_24: bhariyaṃ pabodhetvā ubhopi gantvā taṃ mañcakeneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā nadiyaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4566_25: Tattha naṃ niddāyamānaṃ susumārā viddhaṃsetvā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4567_2: idāni tava mātaraṃ mārehī”ti vatvā “tena hi sādhū”ti vutte “susāne citakaṃ katvā aggimhi naṃ pakkhipitvā māressāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4567_3: Atha naṃ niddāyamānaṃ ubhopi susānaṃ netvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4567_4: Tattha sāmiko bhariyaṃ āha “aggi te ābhato”ti?
atk-s0513a3:4567_10: Tesu gatesu mahallikā sītavātena pabodhitā susānabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ime maṃ māretukāmā aggiatthāya gatā”ti
atk-s0513a3:4567_11: ca upadhāretvā “na me balaṃ jānantī”ti ekaṃ matakaḷevaraṃ gahetvā mañcake nipajjāpetvā upari pilotikāya
atk-s0513a3:4567_12: paṭicchādetvā sayaṃ palāyitvā tattheva leṇaguhaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a3:4567_13: Itare aggiṃ āharitvā “mahallikā”ti saññāya kaḷevaraṃ jhāpetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4567_14: Ekena corena tasmiṃ guhāleṇe pubbe bhaṇḍikā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0513a3:4567_15: so “taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgantvā mahallikaṃ disvā “ekā yakkhinī bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:4567_16: bhaṇḍikā me amanussapariggahitā”ti ekaṃ bhūtavejjaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a3:4568_5: Athassa sā jivhaṃ ḍaṃsitvā chinditvā pātesi.
atk-s0513a3:4568_6: Bhūtavejjo “addhā esā yakkhinī”ti jivhāya lohitaṃ paggharantiyā viravamāno palāyi.
atk-s0513a3:4568_7: Mahallikā punadivase maṭṭhasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā nānāratanabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4568_10: etasmiṃ susāne dārucitakāya jhāpitā evarūpaṃ labhantī”ti. “Amma,
atk-s0513a3:4568_13: Sā laddhabhaṇḍikalobhena sāmikassa kathetvā tattha attānaṃ jhāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4568_18: kiṃ matā nāma āgacchantī”ti taṃ tajjetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4571_0: Sā maṃ gharā nicchubhati, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4572_4: yamahaṃ “imaṃ me nissāya putto puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0513a3:4572_5: mañca mahallikakāle posessatī”ti māliniṃ candanussadaṃ katvā alaṅkaritvā somanassajātā ānesiṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4573_1: suṇisā viya sassuyā mahājanassa rājā paṭisaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4573_2: tato bhaye uppanne kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4573_7: So “rājānaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti aparampi udāharaṇaṃ āhari. Deva,
atk-s0513a3:4573_8: pubbe imasmiṃyeva nagare eko puriso patthanaṃ katvā puttaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a3:4573_9: So puttajātakāle “putto me laddho”ti somanassajāto taṃ posetvā vayappattakāle dārena saṃyojetvā aparabhāge jaraṃ patvā kammaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:4573_10: Atha naṃ putto “tvaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0513a3:4573_12: So kicchena kasirena jīvikaṃ kappento paridevamāno gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4576_0: So maṃ gharā nicchubhati, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4577_0: Tattha so manti so putto maṃ gharato nicchubhati nīharati.
atk-s0513a3:4578_1: yathā pitā nāma mahallako paṭibalena puttena rakkhitabbo,
atk-s0513a3:4578_3: idañca bhayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ sabbasatte rakkhantassa rañño santikā uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4578_4: iminā kāraṇena ‘asuko nāma coro’ti jānāhi, devā”ti. “Tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4578_5: nāhaṃ kāraṇaṃ vā akāraṇaṃ vā jānāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4578_7: tvaññeva vā coro hohī”ti evaṃ rājā punappunaṃ māṇavaṃ anuyuñji.
atk-s0513a3:4578_8: Atha naṃ so evamāha “kiṃ pana, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4578_10: Tena hi “asuko ca asuko ca coro”ti parisamajjhe pakāsemīti.
atk-s0513a3:4578_12: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ rājā attānaṃ rakkhituṃ na deti,
atk-s0513a3:4578_13: gaṇhissāmi dāni cora”nti sannipatite mahājane āmantetvā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a3:4581_0: Yatodakaṃ tadādittaṃ, yato khemaṃ tato bhayaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4585_0: Tattha yatodakaṃ tadādittanti yaṃ udakaṃ tadeva ādittaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4585_1: Yato khemanti yato rājato khemena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4585_3: Atthaguttā viharathāti tumhe idāni anāthā jātā,
atk-s0513a3:4585_5: attanāva guttā hutvā attano santakaṃ dhanadhaññaṃ rakkhatha,
atk-s0513a3:4586_0: Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintayiṃsu “ayaṃ rājā rakkhaṇārahopi samāno idāni aññassa upari dosaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0513a3:4586_1: attano bhaṇḍikaṃ sayameva pokkharaṇiyaṃ ṭhapetvā coraṃ pariyesāpeti,
atk-s0513a3:4586_2: ito dāni paṭṭhāya puna corakammassa akaraṇatthāya mārema naṃ pāparājāna”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4586_3: Te daṇḍamuggarādihatthā uṭṭhāya tattheva rājānañca purohitañca pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā mahāsattaṃ abhisiñcitvā rajje patiṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4587_2: porāṇakapaṇḍitā evaṃ ākāse padaṃ sañjāniṃsū”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4587_3: saccapariyosāne upāsako ca putto ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0513a3:4591_0: Assa indasamo rājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4591_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “bhikkhu sinerukampanavāto
atk-s0513a3:4591_5: pageva tādisa”nti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4592_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente brahmadattassa putto brahmadattakumāro nāma purohitaputto
atk-s0513a3:4592_1: ca kassapo nāma dve sahāyakā hutvā ekācariyakule sabbasippāni uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4592_2: Aparabhāge brahmadattakumāro pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4592_6: ahaṃ mātāpitaro ca rājānañca āpucchitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4592_7: So rājānañca mātāpitaro ca āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sattame divase abhiññā
atk-s0513a3:4592_8: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya yāpento vihāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4592_12: Sakko āvajjento taṃ disvā cintesi “ayaṃ tāpaso ativiya uggatejo sakkabhāvāpi maṃ cāveyya,
atk-s0513a3:4592_13: bārāṇasiraññā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā tapamassa bhindissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4592_14: So sakkānubhāvena aḍḍharattasamaye bārāṇasirañño sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sakalagabbhaṃ sarīrappabhāya obhāsetvā rañño santike ākāse ṭhito “uṭṭhehi,
atk-s0513a3:4592_22: Atha naṃ sakko “tena hi lomasakassapaṃ ānetvā pasughātayaññaṃ yajāpehi,
atk-s0513a3:4592_23: sakkasamo ajarāmaro hutvā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ kāressasī”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4595_0: Sace tvaṃ yaññaṃ yājeyya, isiṃ lomasakassapa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4596_1: Yājeyyāti sace tvaṃ araññāyatanato isiṃ lomasakassapaṃ ānetvā yaññaṃ yajeyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a3:4597_1: Sakko “tena hi mā papañcaṃ karī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a3:4597_2: Rājā punadivase seyyaṃ nāma amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā “samma,
atk-s0513a3:4597_3: mayhaṃ piyasahāyakassa lomasakassapassa santikaṃ gantvā mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi ‘rājā kira tumhehi
atk-s0513a3:4597_7: mayā saddhiṃ yaññaṃ yajituṃ āgacchathā”’ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4597_9: devā”ti tāpasassa vasanokāsajānanatthaṃ nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā ekena vanacarakena “ahaṃ jānāmī”ti vutte
atk-s0513a3:4597_10: taṃ purato katvā mahantena parivārena tattha gantvā isiṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno taṃ sāsanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:4597_11: Atha naṃ so “seyya kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesī”ti vatvā paṭikkhipanto catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4600_0: Na icche saha nindāya, evaṃ seyya vijānahi.
atk-s0513a3:4606_0: Sāyeva jīvikā seyyo, yā cādhammena esanā.
atk-s0513a3:4609_0: Aññaṃ ahiṃsayaṃ loke, api rajjena taṃ vara”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4610_1: Sāgarakuṇḍalanti cattāro dīpe parikkhipitvā ṭhitasāgarehi kaṇṇavaliyā ṭhapitakuṇḍalehi viya samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4610_2: Saha nindāyāti “iminā pasughātakammaṃ kata”nti imāya nindāya saha cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ na icchāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:4610_3: Yā vutti vinipātenāti narake vinipātakammena yā ca jīvitavutti hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4610_6: Sāyeva jīvikāti pabbajitassa mattikāpattaṃ ādāya paragharāni upasaṅkamitvā āhārapariyesanajīvikāva yasadhanalābhato
atk-s0513a3:4610_7: sataguṇena sahassaguṇena varatarāti attho api rajjena taṃ varanti taṃ anagārassa sato aññaṃ avihiṃsantassa
atk-s0513a3:4611_0: Amacco tassa kathaṃ sutvā gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā “anāgacchante kiṃ sakkā kātu”nti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_2: Puna sakko aḍḍharattasamaye āgantvā ākāse ṭhatvā “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:4611_3: lomasakassapaṃ ānetvā yaññaṃ na yajāpesī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4611_5: attano dhītaraṃ candavatiṃ kumārikaṃ alaṅkaritvā seyyaṃ tatheva pesetvā ‘sace kira āgantvā yaññaṃ yajissasi,
atk-s0513a3:4611_6: rājā te imaṃ kumārikaṃ dassatī’ti vadāpehi,
atk-s0513a3:4611_7: addhā so kumārikāya paṭibaddhacitto hutvā āgacchissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4611_8: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā punadivase seyyassa hatthe dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_9: So rājadhītaraṃ gahetvā tattha gantvā isiṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā devaccharapaṭibhāgaṃ rājadhītaraṃ tassa dassetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_10: Atha isi indriyāni bhinditvā taṃ olokesi,
atk-s0513a3:4611_11: saha olokaneneva paṭibaddhacitto hutvā jhānā parihāyi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_14: rājā te imaṃ dārikaṃ pādaparicārikaṃ katvā dassatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4611_15: So kilesavasena kampanto “imaṃ kira me dassatī”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0513a3:4611_17: So “sādhu imaṃ labhanto yajissāmī”ti vatvā taṃ gahetvā saheva jaṭāhi alaṅkatarathaṃ abhiruyha bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_18: Rājāpi “āgacchati kirā”ti sutvā yaññāvāṭe kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_19: Atha naṃ āgataṃ disvā “sve yaññaṃ yajāhi,
atk-s0513a3:4611_23: Atha naṃ rājā punadivase taṃ ādāya candavatiyā saddhiṃyeva yaññāvāṭaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a3:4611_25: Kassapo te sabbe hanitvāva ghātetvā yaññaṃ yajituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a3:4611_26: Atha naṃ tattha sannipatito mahājano disvā “idaṃ te lomasakassapa ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4611_27: kiṃ nāmetaṃ karosī”ti vatvā paridevanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4618_0: Tattha balaṃ cando balaṃ suriyoti mahandhakāravidhamane aññaṃ balaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:4618_2: Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayavegasahane khantibalañāṇabalena samannāgatā samitapāpabāhitapāpā samaṇabrāhmaṇā.
atk-s0513a3:4618_3: Balaṃ velā samuddassāti mahāsamuddassa uttarituṃ adatvā udakaṃ āvaritvā vināsetuṃ samatthatāya velā balaṃ nāma.
atk-s0513a3:4618_4: Balātibalamitthiyoti itthiyo pana visadañāṇepi avītarāge attano vasaṃ ānetvā vināsetuṃ samatthatāya tehi sabbehi balehipi atibalā nāma,
atk-s0513a3:4618_9: yasmā imaṃ uggatapaṃ samānaṃ sīlādiguṇānaṃ esitattā isiṃ ayaṃ candavatī nissīlaṃ katvā pitu vuḍḍhiatthāya vājapeyyaṃ yaññaṃ yājeti,
atk-s0513a3:4619_0: Tasmiṃ samaye kassapo yaññaṃ yajanatthāya “maṅgalahatthiṃ gīvāyaṃ paharissāmī”ti khaggaratanaṃ ukkhipi.
atk-s0513a3:4619_1: Hatthī taṃ disvā maraṇabhayatajjito mahāravaṃ ravi.
atk-s0513a3:4619_2: Tassa ravaṃ sutvā sesāpi hatthiassausabhādayo maraṇabhayatajjitā bhayena viraviṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4619_4: Kassapo taṃ mahāviravaṃ sutvā saṃvegappatto hutvā attano jaṭādīni olokesi.
atk-s0513a3:4619_6: So vippaṭisārī hutvā “ananurūpaṃ vata me pāpakammaṃ kata”nti saṃvegaṃ pakāsento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4622_0: Tassa mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4623_1: yaṃ etaṃ mayā candavatiyā lobhaṃ uppādetvā tena lobhena pakataṃ kāmahetukaṃ pāpakaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4623_5: paññākhaggaṃ nīharitvā subhanimittabandhanena saddhiṃ sabandhanaṃ rāgaṃ chindissāmīti.
atk-s0513a3:4624_1: idāni te candavatiṃ kumāriñca raṭṭhañca sattaratanarāsiñca dassāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4626_0: “Dhiratthu kāme subahūpi loke, tapova seyyo kāmaguṇehi rāja;
atk-s0513a3:4627_0: Tapo karissāmi pahāya kāme, taveva raṭṭhaṃ candavatī ca hotū”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4628_0: Tattha subahūpīti atibahukepi. Tapo karissāmīti sīlasaṃyamatapameva karissāmi.
atk-s0513a3:4629_0: So evaṃ vatvā kasiṇaṃ samannāharitvā naṭṭhaṃ visesaṃ uppādetvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā rañño dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4629_1: desetvā “appamatto hohī”ti ovaditvā yaññāvāṭaṃ viddhaṃsāpetvā mahājanassa abhayadānaṃ dāpetvā rañño yācantasseva
atk-s0513a3:4629_2: uppatitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gantvā yāvajīvaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4630_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4634_0: Kāsāyavattheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4634_2: ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni chaḍḍetvā pātova sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā visākhāya gehe anekakhādanīyaparivāraṃ
atk-s0513a3:4634_3: yāguṃ pivitvā nānaggarasasālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjitvāpi tena atitto tato cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikassa mahāanāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0513a3:4634_4: kosalaraññoti tesaṃ tesaṃ nivesanāni sandhāya vicari.
atk-s0513a3:4634_5: Athekadivasaṃ tassa lolabhāvaṃ ārabbha dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4634_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4634_10: pubbepi tvaṃ lolabhāvena bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthikuṇapādīni khāditvā vicaranto tehi atitto tato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a3:4634_11: gaṅgātīre vicaranto himavantaṃ pavaṭṭho”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4635_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko lolakāko bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthikuṇapādīni khāditvā vicaranto
atk-s0513a3:4635_1: tehi atitto “gaṅgākūle macchamataṃ khādissāmī”ti gantvā tattha matamacche khādanto katipāhaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a3:4635_2: himavantaṃ pavisitvā nānāphalāphalāni khādanto bahumacchakacchapaṃ mahantaṃ padumasaraṃ patvā tattha
atk-s0513a3:4635_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇe dve cakkavāke sevālaṃ khāditvā vasante disvā “ime ativiya vaṇṇasampannā sobhaggappattā,
atk-s0513a3:4635_5: imesaṃ bhojanaṃ pucchitvā ahampi tadeva bhuñjitvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4635_6: gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekasmiṃ sākhapariyante nisīditvā tesaṃ pasaṃsanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ kathento
atk-s0513a3:4637_0: “Kāsāyavatthe sakuṇe vadāmi, duve duve nandamane carante;
atk-s0513a3:4638_0: Kaṃ aṇḍajaṃ aṇḍajā mānusesu, jātiṃ pasaṃsanti tadiṅgha brūthā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4639_3: Kaṃ aṇḍajaṃ aṇḍajā mānusesu jātiṃ pasaṃsantīti ambho aṇḍajā tumhe manussesu pasaṃsantā kaṃ aṇḍajaṃ jātiṃ kataraṃ nāma aṇḍajanti vatvā pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0513a3:4639_4: kaṃ sakuṇaṃ nāmāti vatvā tumhe manussānaṃ antare vaṇṇentīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4639_7: tumhe aṇḍajesu ca mānusesu ca kataraṃ aṇḍajanti vatvā pasaṃsantīti.
atk-s0513a3:4643_0: Kalyāṇabhāvamhe dijesu sammatā, abhirūpā vicarāma aṇṇave”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4644_0: Tattha manussahiṃsāti kāko manusse hiṃsati viheṭheti,
atk-s0513a3:4644_3: Cakkavāketi cakkavākā nāma sā aṇḍajajātīti pasaṃsanti vaṇṇenti kathenti.
atk-s0513a3:4644_10: imasmiṃ padumasare mayameva dve janā paresaṃ ahiṃsanato abhirūpā vicarāmāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4644_11: Imissāya pana gāthāya catutthapadaṃ “na ghāsahetūpi karoma pāpa”nti paṭhanti.
atk-s0513a3:4644_13: yasmā mayaṃ ghāsahetūpi pāpaṃ na karoma,
atk-s0513a3:4644_14: tasmā “kalyāṇabhāvā”ti amhe manussesu ca dijesu ca sammatā.
atk-s0513a3:4647_0: “Kiṃ aṇṇave kāni phalāni bhuñje, maṃsaṃ kuto khādatha cakkavākā;
atk-s0513a3:4648_0: Kiṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjatha vo anomā, balañca vaṇṇo ca anapparūpā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4649_4: kiṃ bhuñjathāti attho maṃsaṃ kuto khādathāti katarapāṇānaṃ sarīrato maṃsaṃ khādatha.
atk-s0513a3:4649_6: parapadena vāssa sambandho “balañca vā vaṇṇo ca anapparūpā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4652_0: “Na aṇṇave santi phalāni dhaṅka, maṃsaṃ kuto khādituṃ cakkavāke;
atk-s0513a3:4653_0: Sevālabhakkhamha apāṇabhojanā, na ghāsahetūpi karoma pāpa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4654_3: Na ghāsahetūti tumhādisā viya mayaṃ ghāsahetu pāpaṃ na karomāti.
atk-s0513a3:4657_0: “Na me idaṃ ruccati cakkavāka, asmiṃ bhave bhojanasannikāso;
atk-s0513a3:4658_0: Ahosi pubbe tato me aññathā, icceva me vimati ettha jātā.
atk-s0513a3:4660_0: “Ahampi maṃsāni phalāni bhuñje, annāni ca loṇiyateliyāni;
atk-s0513a3:4661_0: Rasaṃ manussesu labhāmi bhottuṃ, sūrova saṅgāmamukhaṃ vijetvā;
atk-s0513a3:4662_0: Na ca me tādiso vaṇṇo, cakkavāka yathā tavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4663_0: Tattha idanti idaṃ tumhākaṃ bhuñjanabhojanaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati.
atk-s0513a3:4663_1: Asmiṃ bhave bhojanasannikāsoti imasmiṃ bhave bhojanasannikāso yaṃ imasmiṃ cakkavākabhave bhojanaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4663_2: tvaṃ tena sannikāso taṃsadiso tadanurūpo ahosi,
atk-s0513a3:4663_4: Tato me aññathāti yaṃ mayhaṃ pubbe tumhe disvāva ete ettha nānāvidhāni phalāni ceva macchamaṃsañca khādanti,
atk-s0513a3:4663_6: idāni me tato aññathā hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4663_7: Icceva meti eteneva me kāraṇena ettha tumhākaṃ sarīravaṇṇe vimati jātā “kathaṃ nu kho ete evarūpaṃ lūkhabhojanaṃ bhuñjantā vaṇṇavanto jātā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4663_14: Vijetvāti yathā sūro vīrayodho saṅgāmamukhaṃ vijetvā vilumpitvā paribhuñjati,
atk-s0513a3:4663_16: Yathā tavāti evaṃ paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjantassapi mama tādiso vaṇṇo natthi,
atk-s0513a3:4663_18: tena tava vacanaṃ na saddahāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a3:4664_0: Athassa vaṇṇasampattiyā abhāvakāraṇaṃ attano ca bhāvakāraṇaṃ kathento cakkavāko sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4667_0: Na tussasī rukkhaphalehi dhaṅka, maṃsāni vā yāni susānamajjhe.
atk-s0513a3:4669_0: “Yo sāhasena adhigamma bhoge, paribhuñjati dhaṅka khaṇānupātī;
atk-s0513a3:4670_0: Tato upakkosati naṃ sabhāvo, upakkuṭṭho vaṇṇabalaṃ jahāti.
atk-s0513a3:4672_0: “Appampi ce nibbutiṃ bhuñjatī yadi, asāhasena aparūpaghātī;
atk-s0513a3:4673_0: Balañca vaṇṇo ca tadassa hoti, na hi sabbo āhāramayena vaṇṇo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4674_0: Tattha asuddhabhakkhosīti tvaṃ thenetvā vañcetvā bhakkhanato asuddhabhakkho asi.
atk-s0513a3:4674_2: Kicchena teti tayā dukkhena annapānaṃ labbhati.
atk-s0513a3:4674_3: Maṃsāni vā yānīti yāni vā susānamajjhe maṃsāni,
atk-s0513a3:4674_6: Upakkosati naṃ sabhāvoti attāva taṃ puggalaṃ garahi.
atk-s0513a3:4674_7: Upakkuṭṭhoti attanāpi parehipi upakkuṭṭho garahito vippaṭisāritāya vaṇṇañca balañca jahāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4674_8: Nibbutiṃ bhuñjatī yadīti yadi pana paraṃ aviheṭhetvā appakampi dhammaladdhaṃ nibbutibhojanaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-s0513a3:4674_9: Tadassa hotīti tadā assa paṇḍitassa sarīre balañca vaṇṇo ca hoti.
atk-s0513a3:4675_1: Kāko harāyitvā “na mayhaṃ tava vaṇṇena attho,
atk-s0513a3:4676_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4680_0: Sutitikkhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4680_2: Atītavatthumhi pana sā kumārikā tassa tāpasakumārassa sīlaṃ bhinditvā attano vase ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4680_3: vañcetvā manussapathaṃ nessāmī”ti cintetvā “rūpādikāmaguṇavirahite araññe rakkhitasīlaṃ nāma na mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4680_5: ehi mayā saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sīlaṃ rakkhāhi,
atk-s0513a3:4680_6: kiṃ te araññenā”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4683_0: Ye ca gāme titikkhanti, te uḷāratarā tayā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4684_0: Tattha sutitikkhanti suṭṭhu adhivāsanaṃ. Titikkhantīti sītādīni adhivāsenti.
atk-s0513a3:4685_0: Taṃ sutvā tāpasakumāro “pitā me araññaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a3:4685_1: tasmiṃ āgate taṃ āpucchitvā gamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4685_6: Atha naṃ sā “tena hi ahaṃ maggasaññaṃ kurumānā paṭhamataraṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4685_8: So tassā gatakāle neva dārūni āhari,
atk-s0513a3:4685_13: Atha naṃ pitā “itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gato eso”ti ñatvāpi “kasmā tāta,
atk-s0513a3:4685_19: araññe kira rakkhitasīlaṃ nāma na mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4685_22: sahāyo me maṃ ‘āgaccheyyāsī’ti vatvā purato gato,
atk-s0513a3:4685_24: tattha pana vasantena mayā kataro puriso sevitabbo”ti pucchanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4688_0: Purisaṃ tāta seveyyaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4691_0: “Yo te vissāsaye tāta, vissāsañca khameyya te;
atk-s0513a3:4692_0: Sussūsī ca titikkhī ca, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
atk-s0513a3:4695_0: Urasīva patiṭṭhāya, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
atk-s0513a3:4697_0: “Yo ca dhammena carati, carantopi na maññati;
atk-s0513a3:4698_0: Visuddhakāriṃ sappaññaṃ, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
atk-s0513a3:4701_0: Tādisaṃ tāta mā sevi, nimmanussampi ce siyā.
atk-s0513a3:4709_0: “Taṃ tāhaṃ tāta yācāmi, karassu vacanaṃ mama;
atk-s0513a3:4710_0: Māssu bālena saṃgacchi, dukkho bālehi saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4711_0: Tattha yo te vissāsayeti yo tava vissāseyya.
atk-s0513a3:4711_1: Khameyya teti yo ca tava attani tayā kataṃ vissāsaṃ khameyya.
atk-s0513a3:4711_2: Sussūsī ca titikkhī cāti tava vacanaṃ sussūsāya ceva vacanādhivāsanena ca samannāgato bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4711_3: Urasīva patiṭṭhāyāti yathā mātu urasi putto patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0513a3:4711_4: evaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā attano mātaraṃ viya maññamāno taṃ bhajeyyāsīti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:4711_5: Yo ca dhammena caratīti yo tividhena sucaritena dhammena iriyati.
atk-s0513a3:4711_6: Na maññatīti tathā carantopi “ahaṃ dhammaṃ carāmī”ti mānaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a3:4712_0: Rāgavirāginanti rāginañca virāginañca rajjitvā taṃkhaṇaññeva virajjanasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4712_1: Nimmanussampi ce siyāti sacepi sakalajambudīpatalaṃ nimmanussaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a3:4712_9: bālena saha saṃvāso nāma amittasaṃvāso viya sabbadā niccakālameva dukkho.
atk-s0513a3:4712_10: Taṃ tāhanti tena kāraṇena taṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4713_1: ahaṃ manussapathaṃ gantvā tumhādise paṇḍite na labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4713_4: Athassa bhiyyopi ovādaṃ datvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a3:4713_5: So na cirasseva abhiññāsamāpattiyo nibbattetvā saddhiṃ pitarā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:4714_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4719_0: Kuto nu āgacchathāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4719_1: Tañhi satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4719_4: pubbe dānavarakkhasā gilitvā kucchinā pariharantāpi mātugāmaṃ rakkhituṃ ekapurisanissitaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a3:4719_5: tvaṃ kathaṃ sakkhissasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4720_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāme pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4720_1: pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā phalāphalena yāpento vihāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4720_2: Tassa paṇṇasālāya avidūre eko dānavarakkhaso vasati.
atk-s0513a3:4720_3: So antarantarā mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0513a3:4720_4: aṭaviyaṃ pana manussānaṃ sañcaraṇamagge ṭhatvā āgatāgate manusse gahetvā khādati.
atk-s0513a3:4720_5: Tasmiṃ kāle ekā kāsiraṭṭhe kuladhītā uttamarūpadharā aññatarasmiṃ paccantagāme nivutthā hoti.
atk-s0513a3:4720_6: Tassā ekadivasaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dassanatthāya gantvā paccāgamanakāle parivāramanusse disvā so dānavo bheravarūpena pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a3:4720_8: Dānavo yāne nisinnaṃ abhirūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā taṃ attano guhaṃ netvā bhariyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4720_9: Tato paṭṭhāya sappitelataṇḍulamacchamaṃsādīni ceva madhuraphalāphalāni ca āharitvā taṃ posesi,
atk-s0513a3:4720_10: vatthālaṅkārehi ca naṃ alaṅkaritvā rakkhaṇatthāya ekasmiṃ karaṇḍake pakkhipitvā karaṇḍakaṃ gilitvā kucchinā pariharati.
atk-s0513a3:4720_11: So ekadivasaṃ nhāyitukāmatāya ekaṃ saraṃ gantvā karaṇḍakaṃ uggilitvā taṃ tato nīharitvā nhāpetvā vilimpetvā
atk-s0513a3:4720_12: alaṅkāretvā “thokaṃ tava sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpehī”ti taṃ karaṇḍakasamīpe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nhānatitthaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0513a3:4720_13: taṃ anāsaṅkamāno thokaṃ dūraṃ gantvā nhāyi.
atk-s0513a3:4721_0: Tasmiṃ samaye vāyussaputto nāma vijjādharo sannaddhakhaggo ākāsena gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:4721_3: Atha naṃ sā karaṇḍake pakkhipitvā dānavassa āgamanaṃ olokentī karaṇḍakūpari nisīditvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4721_4: disvā tassa attānaṃ dassetvā tasmiṃ karaṇḍakasamīpaṃ asampatteyeva karaṇḍakaṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā
atk-s0513a3:4721_5: vijjādharassa upari nipajjitvā attano sāṭakaṃ pārupi.
atk-s0513a3:4721_6: Dānavo āgantvā karaṇḍakaṃ asodhetvā “mātugāmoyeva me”ti saññāya karaṇḍakaṃ gilitvā attano guhaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a3:4721_10: Tāpasopi naṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā dvinnaṃ janānaṃ kucchigatabhāvaṃ ñatvā sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4723_0: “Kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā, svāgatā etha nisīdathāsane;
atk-s0513a3:4724_0: Kaccittha, bhonto kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ, cirassamabbhāgamanañhi vo idhā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4725_3: Kusalaṃ anāmayanti kacci tumhākaṃ kusalaṃ ārogyaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4725_4: Cirassamabbhāgamanañhi vo idhāti ajja tumhākaṃ idha abbhāgamanañca ciraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4726_0: Taṃ sutvā dānavo “ahaṃ imassa tāpasassa santikaṃ ekakova āgato,
atk-s0513a3:4726_3: kiṃ nu kho sabhāvaṃ ñatvā katheti,
atk-s0513a3:4726_4: udāhu ummattako hutvā vilapatī”ti cintetvā tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4728_0: “Ahameva eko idha majja patto, na cāpi me dutiyo koci vijjati;
atk-s0513a3:4729_0: Kimeva sandhāya te bhāsitaṃ ise, kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4730_1: Kimeva sandhāya te bhāsitaṃ iseti bhante,
atk-s0513a3:4730_2: isi kiṃ nāmetaṃ sandhāya tayā bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4731_1: bhante”ti vutte “tena hi suṇāhī”ti vatvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4733_0: “Tuvañca eko bhariyā ca te piyā, samuggapakkhittanikiṇṇamantare;
atk-s0513a3:4734_0: Sā rakkhitā kucchigatāva te sadā, vāyussaputtena sahā tahiṃ ratā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4735_0: Tattha tuvañca ekoti paṭhamaṃ tāva tvaṃ eko jano.
atk-s0513a3:4735_1: Pakkhittanikiṇṇamantareti pakkhittānikiṇṇaantare taṃ tattha bhariyaṃ rakkhitukāmena sadā tayā samugge pakkhittā saddhiṃ samuggena nikiṇṇā antare,
atk-s0513a3:4735_4: Tahiṃ ratāti tattha tava antokucchiyaññeva kilesaratiyā ratā.
atk-s0513a3:4735_5: So dāni tvaṃ mātugāmaṃ “ekaṃ purisanissitaṃ karissāmī”ti kucchināpi pariharanto tassā jāraṃ ukkhipitvā carasīti.
atk-s0513a3:4736_0: Taṃ sutvā dānavo “vijjādharā nāma bahumāyā honti,
atk-s0513a3:4736_2: kucchiṃ me phāletvāpi palāyissatī”ti bhītatasito hutvā khippaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ uggilitvā purato ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a3:4736_3: Satthā abhisambuddho hutvā taṃ pavattiṃ pakāsento catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4738_0: “Saṃviggarūpo isinā viyākato, so dānavo tattha samuggamuggili;
atk-s0513a3:4739_0: Addakkhi bhariyaṃ sucimāladhāriniṃ, vāyussaputtena sahā tahiṃ rata”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4740_0: Tattha addakkhīti so karaṇḍakaṃ vivaritvā addasa.
atk-s0513a3:4741_0: Karaṇḍake pana vivaṭamatteyeva vijjādharo vijjaṃ jappitvā khaggaṃ gahetvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a3:4741_1: Taṃ disvā dānavo mahāsattassa tussitvā thutipubbaṅgamā sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:4744_0: Yathā have pāṇarivettha rakkhitā, duṭṭhā mayī aññamabhippamodayi.
atk-s0513a3:4746_0: “Divā ca ratto ca mayā upaṭṭhitā, tapassinā jotirivā vane vasaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4747_0: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
atk-s0513a3:4749_0: “Sarīramajjhamhi ṭhitāti maññahaṃ, mayhaṃ ayanti asatiṃ asaññataṃ;
atk-s0513a3:4750_0: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
atk-s0513a3:4752_0: “Surakkhitaṃ meti kathaṃ nu vissase, anekacittāsu na hatthi rakkhaṇā;
atk-s0513a3:4753_0: Etā hi pātālapapātasannibhā, etthappamatto byasanaṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0513a3:4755_0: “Tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā, ye mātugāmehi caranti nissaṭā;
atk-s0513a3:4756_0: Etaṃ sivaṃ uttamamābhipatthayaṃ, na mātugāmehi kareyya santhava”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4757_1: isi uggatapānuvattinā tayā sudiṭṭharūpaṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4757_3: Yathā have pāṇarivettha rakkhitāti ayaṃ mayā attano pāṇā viya ettha antokucchiyaṃ pariharantena rakkhitā.
atk-s0513a3:4757_4: Duṭṭhā mayīti idāni mayi mittadubbhikammaṃ katvā duṭṭhā aññaṃ purisaṃ abhippamodati.
atk-s0513a3:4757_5: Jotirivā vane vasanti vane vasantena tapassinā aggi viya mayā upaṭṭhitā paricaritā.
atk-s0513a3:4757_6: Sā dhammamukkammāti sā esā dhammaṃ okkamitvā atikkamitvā.
atk-s0513a3:4757_9: mayhaṃ ayanti asatiṃ asaññatanti imaṃ asatiṃ asappurisadhammasamannāgataṃ asaññataṃ dussīlaṃ “mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:4757_10: sarīramajjhamhi ṭhitā”ti ca “mayhaṃ aya”nti ca maññāmi.
atk-s0513a3:4758_0: Surakkhitaṃ meti kathaṃ nu vissaseti ayaṃ mayā surakkhitāti kathaṃ paṇḍito vissāseyya,
atk-s0513a3:4758_1: yatra hi nāma mādisopi antokucchiyaṃ rakkhanto rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:4758_2: Pātālapapātasannibhāti lokassādena duppūraṇīyattā mahāsamudde pātālasaṅkhātena papātena sadisā.
atk-s0513a3:4758_3: Etthappamattoti etāsu evarūpāsu nigguṇāsu pamatto puriso mahābyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a3:4758_4: Tasmā hīti yasmā mātugāmavasaṃ gatā mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0513a3:4758_5: tasmā ye mātugāmehi nissaṭā hutvā caranti,
atk-s0513a3:4758_7: Etaṃ sivanti yadetaṃ mātugāmato nissaṭānaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhānaṃ caraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4758_8: etaṃ jhānasukhameva sivaṃ khemaṃ uttamaṃ abhipatthetabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4758_9: etaṃ patthayamāno mātugāmehi saddhiṃ santhavaṃ na kareyyāti.
atk-s0513a3:4759_0: Evañca pana vatvā dānavo mahāsattassa pādesu nipatitvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a3:4759_2: ahaṃ imāya pāpadhammāya vijjādharena mārāpito”ti mahāsattaṃ abhitthavi.
atk-s0513a3:4759_3: Sopissa dhammaṃ desetvā “imissā mā kiñci pāpaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a3:4759_4: sīlāni gaṇhāhī”ti taṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:4759_5: Dānavo “ahaṃ kucchinā pariharantopi taṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a3:4759_6: añño ko rakkhissatī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā attano araññameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4760_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:4764_0: Na kho me ruccatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto indriyaasaṃvaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4764_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye bahū bhikkhū indriyesu aguttadvārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4764_2: Satthā “ime bhikkhū ovadituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ānandattherassa vatvā aniyamavasena bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
atk-s0513a3:4764_5: bhikkhunā nāma rūpādīsu subhanimittavasena nimittaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a3:4764_6: sace hi tasmiṃ samaye kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a3:4764_10: rūpādigocarā hi diṭṭheva dhamme mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0513a3:4764_13: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭha”nti vitthāretvā
atk-s0513a3:4764_23: Etasmiñhi vo gocare carantānaṃ na lacchati māro otāraṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4764_24: sace pana kilesavasikā hutvā subhanimittavasena olokessatha,
atk-s0513a3:4764_25: pūtimaṃsasiṅgālo viya attano gocarā parihāyissathā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:4765_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente himavantapadese araññāyatane pabbataguhāyaṃ anekasatā eḷakā vasanti.
atk-s0513a3:4765_1: Tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre ekissā guhāya pūtimaṃso nāma siṅgālo veṇiyā nāma bhariyāya saddhiṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a3:4765_2: So ekadivasaṃ bhariyāya saddhiṃ vicaranto te eḷake disvā “ekena upāyena imesaṃ maṃsaṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā upāyena ekekaṃ eḷakaṃ māresi.
atk-s0513a3:4765_3: Te ubhopi eḷakamaṃsaṃ khādantā thāmasampannā thūlasarīrā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4765_5: Tesaṃ antare meṇḍamātā nāma ekā eḷikā byattā ahosi upāyakusalā.
atk-s0513a3:4765_6: Siṅgālo taṃ māretuṃ asakkonto ekadivasaṃ bhariyāya saddhiṃ sammantento “bhadde,
atk-s0513a3:4765_8: imaṃ eḷikaṃ ekena upāyena khādituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a3:4765_10: tvaṃ ekikāva gantvā etāya saddhiṃ sakhī hohi,
atk-s0513a3:4765_11: atha te tāya saddhiṃ vissāse uppanne ahaṃ matālayaṃ karitvā nipajjissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4765_12: tvaṃ etaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘eḷike sāmiko me mato,
atk-s0513a3:4765_14: ṭhapetvā taṃ añño me ñātako natthi,
atk-s0513a3:4765_15: ehi roditvā kanditvā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmā’ti vatvā taṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a3:4765_16: atha naṃ ahaṃ uppatitvā gīvāya ḍaṃsitvā māressāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4766_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tāya saddhiṃ sakhibhāvaṃ katvā vissāse uppanne eḷikaṃ tathā avoca.
atk-s0513a3:4766_1: Eḷikā “āḷi siṅgāli tava sāmikena sabbe mama ñātakā khāditā,
atk-s0513a3:4766_2: bhāyāmi na sakkomi gantu”nti āha. “Āḷi, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a3:4766_5: bhāyāmevāha”nti sā evaṃ vatvāpi tāya punappunaṃ yāciyamānā “addhā mato bhavissatī”ti sampaṭicchitvā tāya saddhiṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a3:4766_7: kiṃ bhavissatī”ti tasmiṃ āsaṅkāya siṅgāliṃ purato katvā siṅgālaṃ pariggaṇhantīyeva gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:4766_8: Siṅgālo tāsaṃ padasaddaṃ sutvā “āgatā nu kho eḷikā”ti sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā akkhīni parivattetvā olokesi.
atk-s0513a3:4766_9: Eḷikā taṃ tathā karontaṃ disvā “ayaṃ pāpadhammo maṃ vañcetvā māretukāmo matālayaṃ dassetvā nipanno”ti
atk-s0513a3:4766_10: nivattitvā palāyantī siṅgāliyā “kasmā palāyasī”ti vutte taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathentī paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4768_0: “Na kho me ruccati āḷi, pūtimaṃsassa pekkhanā;
atk-s0513a3:4770_2: Etādisā sakhārasmāti evarūpā sahāyakā apakkamitvā taṃ sahāyakaṃ ārakā parivajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4771_0: Evañca pana vatvā sā nivattitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0513a3:4771_1: Siṅgālī taṃ nivattetuṃ asakkontī tassā kujjhitvā attano sāmikasseva santikaṃ gantvā pajjhāyamānā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a3:4771_2: Atha naṃ siṅgālo garahanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4775_1: Vaṇṇeti patino sakhinti paṭhamameva attano sakhiṃ eḷikaṃ “mayi sinehā vissāsikā āgamissati no santikaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:4775_3: Atha naṃ sā idāni āgataṃ mama santikaṃ anāgantvāva paṭigacchantiṃ meṇḍamātaraṃ pajjhāyati anusocatīti.
atk-s0513a3:4779_0: Yo tvaṃ matālayaṃ katvā, akālena vipekkhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4780_1: Akālena vipekkhasīti eḷikāya attano santikaṃ anāgatāyeva olokesīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4783_0: Pūtimaṃsova pajjhāyi, yo akāle vipekkhatī”ti. – ayaṃ abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0513a3:4784_0: Tattha akāleti kāmaguṇe ārabbha subhavasena cittuppādakāle.
atk-s0513a3:4784_1: Ayañhi bhikkhuno rūpaṃ oloketuṃ akālo nāma.
atk-s0513a3:4784_2: Kāleti asubhavasena anussativasena kasiṇavasena vā rūpaggahaṇakāle.
atk-s0513a3:4784_3: Ayañhi bhikkhuno rūpaṃ oloketuṃ kālo nāma.
atk-s0513a3:4784_4: Tattha akāle sārattakāle rūpaṃ olokentā mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇantīti haritacajātakalomasakassapajātakādīhi dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4784_5: Kāle asubhavasena olokentā arahatte patiṭṭhahantīti asubhakammikatissattheravatthunā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:4784_7: yathā pūtimaṃsasiṅgālo akāle eḷikaṃ oloketvā attano gocarā parihīno pajjhāyati,
atk-s0513a3:4784_8: evaṃ bhikkhu akāle subhavasena rūpaṃ oloketvā satipaṭṭhānādigocarā parihīno diṭṭhadhamme samparāyepi socati pajjhāyati kilamatīti.
atk-s0513a3:4785_3: tvaṃ āgatakāle appamatto gaṇheyyāsī”ti vatvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā “āḷi,
atk-s0513a3:4785_5: tava āgatakālasmiṃyeva hi me sāmiko satiṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0513a3:4785_7: ehi tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karohī”ti vatvā pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4787_0: “Piyaṃ kho āḷi me hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāhi me;
atk-s0513a3:4789_0: Tattha puṇṇapattaṃ dadāhi meti piyakkhānaṃ akkhāyikā mayhaṃ tuṭṭhidānaṃ dehi.
atk-s0513a3:4789_1: Pati sañjīvito mayhanti mama sāmiko sañjīvito uṭṭhito arogoti attho.
atk-s0513a3:4790_2: upāyeneva naṃ vañcessāmī”ti cintetvā chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4792_0: “Piyaṃ kho āḷi te hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāmi te;
atk-s0513a3:4794_0: Tattha essanti āgamissāmi. Āgacchamānā ca attano ārakkhaṃ katvā mahantena parivārena āgamissāmīti.
atk-s0513a3:4795_0: Atha naṃ siṅgālī parivāraṃ pucchantī sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4798_0: Kiṃ nāmakā ca te sabbe, te me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4802_0: Ediso mayhaṃ parivāro, tesaṃ kayirāhi bhojana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4803_0: Tattha te meti te parivāre mayhaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a3:4803_3: evaṃ dvīhi sunakhasahassehi parivāritā āgamissāmī”ti vatvā “sace te bhojanaṃ na labhissanti,
atk-s0513a3:4803_4: tumhe dvepi jane māretvā khādissantī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:4804_0: Taṃ sutvā siṅgālī bhītā “alaṃ imissā tattha gamanena,
atk-s0513a3:4804_1: upāyenassā anāgamanameva karissāmī”ti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:4807_0: Ārogyaṃ āḷino vajjaṃ, idheva vasa māgamā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:4808_2: taṃ te nikkhantāya agārasmā anārakkhaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ vinassati,
atk-s0513a3:4808_3: ahameva te āḷino sahāyakassa ārogyaṃ vajjaṃ vadissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:4809_0: Evañca pana vatvā maraṇabhayabhītā vegena sāmikassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ gahetvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a3:4809_1: Te puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:4810_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā ahaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne vanajeṭṭhakarukkhe nibbattadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:4814_0: Yo te puttaketi idaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:4814_1: Tasmiñhi samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho āvuso devadatto nillajjo anariyo evaṃ uttamaguṇadharassa
atk-s0513a3:4814_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a3:4814_9: idāni pana me tāsamattampi kātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
